casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Naegele, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Naegele (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 19.]

(No. 98-467 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided November 25, 1998.) Christian Erhardt, Jr., for appellant.

*20The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
